Text: The bluRay cover looks pretty nice I have to admit, and plenty of you have downloaded this (going by the seeds) and still no comments re: quality. Do what I did and download only the SAMPLE and then make up your mind. It's also in 2.35:1 widescreen just for the record!
Resolution is 1280x544 and quality is exceptional
Aspect ratio is way off, see the screenshots. I had to adjust manually.
no problems with the ar perfect thanks
